opinions.title: Destructuring in Function Parameter Lists
opinions.body: If a function accepts a parameter that will contain an object it can be de-structured to "pull out" the object properties and make them available as locally scoped variables (i.e., variables only available inside the function body)

opinions.title: React is Awesome
opinions.body: React is an amazing JavaScript library! Despite all it's shortcomings.

opinions.title: Do yourself a favor and learn React!
opinions.body:
React is an amazing JavaScript library!

Despite all it's shortcomings.

opinions.title: React has more depth than you might first think!
opinions.body:
React is a great library to learn, but it's not just about the basics. Dive deeper!
For example with this course!
